articles.content:
Disney is planning to shut down its kids channels in the UK following the launch of Disney+ earlier this year.
Disney Channel, Disney XD and Disney Junior will be taken off-air from the end of Septe… [+2051 chars]

articles.title: Strictly snub Cheryl as they’d ‘rather have only three judges on the panel than her replace Bruno Ton - The Sun
Sherlock Holmes History Proves Enola Holmes Lawsuit is Nonsense - Den of Geek UK
articles.description: The estate who holds a few scraps of the legal copyright to Sherlock Holmes is suing Netflix over a new adaptation called Enola Holmes. Sadly, this aggressive litigious behavior is nothing new.
articles.content: From the moment there were Sherlock Holmes fans, there was Sherlock Holmes fanfiction. In almost every conceivable way, Sherlock Holmes fandom informs nearly all major geek fandoms that followed it: … [+2154 chars]

articles.title: Bob Dylan sets new Official Chart record with Number 1 album - Official Charts Company
articles.description: Neil Young, Phoebe Bridgers and NSG also debut in the Top 40, while the late Dame Vera Lynn returns to the Top 20.
articles.content:
Congratulations to Bob Dylan, who goes straight to Number 1 with his 39th studio album Rough and Rowdy Ways.
